content.name: real_differentiable_within_gamma

proof.th: s ⊆ {x. ∀n. ¬(x + of_nat n = 0)} ⊢ s ⊆ {x. ∀n. ¬(x + of_nat n = 0)}
s ⊆ {x. ∀n. ¬(x + of_nat n = 0)} ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ real_differentiable gamma (within (atreal x) s)
⊢ _VAR x
x ∈ s ⊢ x ∈ s

proof.args: subsetE, {a: real}, {A: s, B: {x::real. ∀n. ¬(x + of_nat n = 0)}, x: x}
proof.th: s ⊆ {x. ∀n. ¬(x + of_nat n = 0)} ⊢ x ∈ s ⟶ x ∈ {x1. ∀n. ¬(x1 + of_nat n = 0)}
s ⊆ {x. ∀n. ¬(x + of_nat n = 0)} ⊢ x ∈ s ⟶ (∀n. ¬(x + of_nat n = 0))
s ⊆ {x. ∀n. ¬(x + of_nat n = 0)}, x ∈ s ⊢ ∀n. ¬(x + of_nat n = 0)
s ⊆ {x. ∀n. ¬(x + of_nat n = 0)}, x ∈ s ⊢ real_differentiable gamma (within (atreal x) s)
s ⊆ {x. ∀n. ¬(x + of_nat n = 0)} ⊢ ∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ real_differentiable gamma (within (atreal x) s)
s ⊆ {x. ∀n. ¬(x + of_nat n = 0)} ⊢ real_differentiable_on gamma s
⊢ s ⊆ {x. ∀n. ¬(x + of_nat n = 0)} ⟶ real_differentiable_on gamma s

content.name: gamma_recurrence
content.prop: gamma (x + 1) = (if x = 0 then 1 else x * gamma x)

content.name: gamma_simple_poles
prop: tendsto_real (λx. (x + of_nat n) * gamma x) (-1 ^ n / of_nat (fact n))

proof.th: 0 < x ⊢ 0 ≤ gamma x
0 < x ⊢ ¬(∃n. x + of_nat n = 0)
0 < x ⊢ ¬(gamma x = 0)
0 < x ⊢ ¬(0 = gamma x)
0 < x ⊢ 0 ≤ gamma x ∧ ¬(0 = gamma x)
0 < x ⊢ 0 < gamma x
⊢ 0 < x ⟶ 0 < gamma x

content.name: gamma_legendre_lt
content.prop: gamma x * gamma (x + 1 / 2) = 2 ^ (1 - 2 * x) * gamma (1 / 2) * gamma (2 * x)

content.name: gamma_reflection
content.prop: gamma x * gamma (1 - x) = pi / sin (pi * x)

content.name: gamma_legendre

proof.args: gamma_half, 2 ^ (1 - 2 * x) * gamma (1 / 2) * gamma (2 * x) = 2 ^ (1 - 2 * x) * sqrt pi * gamma (2 * x)
proof.th: ⊢ 2 ^ (1 - 2 * x) * gamma (1 / 2) * gamma (2 * x) = 2 ^ (1 - 2 * x) * sqrt pi * gamma (2 * x)

proof.args: gamma_legendre_lt, gamma x * gamma (x + 1 / 2) = 2 ^ (1 - 2 * x) * sqrt pi * gamma (2 * x)
proof.th: ⊢ gamma x * gamma (x + 1 / 2) = 2 ^ (1 - 2 * x) * sqrt pi * gamma (2 * x)
⊢ gamma x * gamma (x + 1 / 2) = 2 ^ (1 - 2 * x) * sqrt pi * gamma (2 * x)

content.prop: gamma x * gamma (x + 1 / 2) = 2 ^ (1 - 2 * x) * sqrt pi * gamma (2 * x)

content.name: gamma_weierstrass
prop: product ({1..n}) (λk. exp (x / of_nat k) / (1 + x / of_nat k)))

content.name: real_log_convex_gamma
content.prop: (∀x. x ∈ s ⟶ 0 < x) ⟶ real_log_convex_on gamma s

content.name: gamma_real_log_convex_unique
prop: ⟶ real_log_convex_on f ({x. 0 < x}) ⟶ (∀x. 0 < x ⟶ f x = gamma x)

content.name: euler_has_real_integral_gamma
content.prop: 0 < x ⟶ has_real_integral (λt. t ^ (x - 1) / exp t) (gamma x) ({t. 0 ≤ t})

content.name: euler_real_integral

proof.th: 0 < x ⊢ has_real_integral (λt. t ^ (x - 1) / exp t) (gamma x) ({t. 0 ≤ t})
0 < x ⊢ real_integral ({t. 0 ≤ t}) (λt. t ^ (x - 1) / exp t) = gamma x
⊢ 0 < x ⟶ real_integral ({t. 0 ≤ t}) (λt. t ^ (x - 1) / exp t) = gamma x

content.prop: 0 < x ⟶ real_integral ({t. 0 ≤ t}) (λt. t ^ (x - 1) / exp t) = gamma x

content.name: euler_real_integrable

proof.th: 0 < x ⊢ ∃a1. has_real_integral (λt. t ^ (x - 1) / exp t) a1 ({t. 0 ≤ t})

proof.args: real_integrable_on_def, real_integrable_on (λt. t ^ (x - 1) / exp t) ({t. 0 ≤ t})

content.prop: 0 < x ⟶ real_integrable_on (λt. t ^ (x - 1) / exp t) ({t. 0 ≤ t})

content.name: wallis_alt
prop: (λk. 2 * of_nat k / (2 * of_nat k - 1) * (2 * of_nat k) / (2 * of_nat k + 1)))

proof.th: ⊢ 0 < 1 / 2 ⟶ has_real_integral (λt. t ^ (1 / 2 - 1) / exp t) (gamma (1 / 2)) ({t. 0 ≤ t})
⊢ has_real_integral (λt. t ^ (1 / 2 - 1) / exp t) (gamma (1 / 2)) ({t. 0 ≤ t})
⊢ has_real_integral (λt. t ^ -(1 / 2) / exp t) (gamma (1 / 2)) ({t. 0 ≤ t})

proof.args: has_real_integral_rmul, {}, {c: real_inverse 2, f: λt. t ^ -(1 / 2) / exp t, k: gamma (1 / 2), s: {t::real. 0 ≤ t}}
proof.th: ⊢ has_real_integral (λx. x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x * real_inverse 2) (gamma (1 / 2) * real_inverse 2) ({t. 0 ≤ t})
⊢ has_real_integral (λx. x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2) (gamma (1 / 2) / 2) ({t. 0 ≤ t})

⊢ (∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. if x ∈ {t. 0 ≤ t} then x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2 else 0) (real_closed_interval a b)) ∧ (∀e. 0 < e ⟶ (∃B. 0 < B ∧ (∀a. ∀b. real_closed_interval (-B) B ⊆ real_closed_interval a b ⟶ abs (real_integral (real_closed_interval a b) (λx. if x ∈ {t. 0 ≤ t} then x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2 else 0) - gamma (1 / 2) / 2) < e)))

proof.args: conjD1, {}, {A: ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. if x ∈ {t. 0 ≤ t} then x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2 else 0) (real_closed_interval a b), B: ∀e. 0 < e ⟶ (∃B. 0 < B ∧ (∀a. ∀b. real_closed_interval (-B) B ⊆ real_closed_interval a b ⟶ abs (real_integral (real_closed_interval a b) (λx. if x ∈ {t. 0 ≤ t} then x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2 else 0) - gamma (1 / 2) / 2) < e))}
proof.th: ⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. if x ∈ {t. 0 ≤ t} then x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2 else 0) (real_closed_interval a b)

proof.args: conjD2, {}, {A: ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. if x ∈ {t. 0 ≤ t} then x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2 else 0) (real_closed_interval a b), B: ∀e. 0 < e ⟶ (∃B. 0 < B ∧ (∀a. ∀b. real_closed_interval (-B) B ⊆ real_closed_interval a b ⟶ abs (real_integral (real_closed_interval a b) (λx. if x ∈ {t. 0 ≤ t} then x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2 else 0) - gamma (1 / 2) / 2) < e))}
proof.th: ⊢ ∀e. 0 < e ⟶ (∃B. 0 < B ∧ (∀a. ∀b. real_closed_interval (-B) B ⊆ real_closed_interval a b ⟶ abs (real_integral (real_closed_interval a b) (λx. if x ∈ {t. 0 ≤ t} then x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2 else 0) - gamma (1 / 2) / 2) < e))
⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2) ({t. 0 ≤ t} ∩ real_closed_interval a b)
⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2) ({x. x ∈ {t. 0 ≤ t} ∧ x ∈ real_closed_interval a b})
⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2) ({x. x ∈ {t. 0 ≤ t} ∧ x ∈ {p. a ≤ p ∧ p ≤ b}})
⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2) ({x. 0 ≤ x ∧ a ≤ x ∧ x ≤ b})

proof.args: ∀a::real. ∀b. ∀x. 0 ≤ x ∧ a ≤ x ∧ x ≤ b ⟷ max 0 a ≤ x ∧ x ≤ b
proof.th: ⊢ ∀a::real. ∀b. ∀x. 0 ≤ x ∧ a ≤ x ∧ x ≤ b ⟷ max 0 a ≤ x ∧ x ≤ b
⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2) ({x. max 0 a ≤ x ∧ x ≤ b})
⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. x ^ -(1 / 2) / exp x / 2) (real_closed_interval (max 0 a) b)
⊢ ∀P. (∀a::real. P (max 0 a)) ⟷ (∀a. 0 ≤ a ⟶ P a)

⊢ (∀a. (λy. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) (real_closed_interval y b)) (max 0 a)) ⟷ (∀a. 0 ≤ a ⟶ (λy. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) (real_closed_interval y b)) a)
⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) (real_closed_interval (max 0 a) b)

proof.args: real_closed_interval_def, ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) ({p. max 0 a ≤ p ∧ p ≤ b})
proof.th: ⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) ({p. max 0 a ≤ p ∧ p ≤ b})

proof.args: ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) ({x. 0 ≤ x ∧ a ≤ x ∧ x ≤ b})
proof.th: ⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) ({x. 0 ≤ x ∧ a ≤ x ∧ x ≤ b})

proof.args: member_collect, ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) ({x. x ∈ {x1. 0 ≤ x1} ∧ x ∈ {p. a ≤ p ∧ p ≤ b}})
proof.th: ⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) ({x. x ∈ {x1. 0 ≤ x1} ∧ x ∈ {p. a ≤ p ∧ p ≤ b}})

proof.args: real_closed_interval_def, ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) ({x. x ∈ {x1. 0 ≤ x1} ∧ x ∈ real_closed_interval a b})
proof.th: ⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) ({x. x ∈ {x1. 0 ≤ x1} ∧ x ∈ real_closed_interval a b})

proof.args: inter_def, ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) ({x. 0 ≤ x} ∩ real_closed_interval a b)
proof.th: ⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) ({x. 0 ≤ x} ∩ real_closed_interval a b)

proof.args: real_integrable_restrict_inter, ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. if x ∈ {x1. 0 ≤ x1} then exp (-(x ^ (2::nat))) else 0) (real_closed_interval a b)
proof.th: ⊢ ∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. if x ∈ {x1. 0 ≤ x1} then exp (-(x ^ (2::nat))) else 0) (real_closed_interval a b)

⊢ ∀e. 0 < e ⟶ (∃B. 0 < B ∧ (∀a. ∀b. real_closed_interval (-B) B ⊆ real_closed_interval a b ⟶ abs (real_integral (real_closed_interval a b) (λx. if x ∈ {x1. 0 ≤ x1} then exp (-(x ^ (2::nat))) else 0) - gamma (1 / 2) / 2) < e))

⊢ (∀a. ∀b. real_integrable_on (λx. if x ∈ {x1. 0 ≤ x1} then exp (-(x ^ (2::nat))) else 0) (real_closed_interval a b)) ∧ (∀e. 0 < e ⟶ (∃B. 0 < B ∧ (∀a. ∀b. real_closed_interval (-B) B ⊆ real_closed_interval a b ⟶ abs (real_integral (real_closed_interval a b) (λx. if x ∈ {x1. 0 ≤ x1} then exp (-(x ^ (2::nat))) else 0) - gamma (1 / 2) / 2) < e)))
⊢ has_real_integral (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) (gamma (1 / 2) / 2) ({x. 0 ≤ x})
⊢ has_real_integral (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) (sqrt pi) univ
⊢ has_real_integral (λx. exp (-(x ^ (2::nat)))) (sqrt pi) univ

steps.goal: !a::real. !b. !x. 0 ≤ x ∧ a ≤ x ∧ x ≤ b <--> max 0 a <= x & x <= b

description: Real gamma functions and Euler_Mascheroni const. Refer to gamma.ml from HOL light
name: realgamma
